articles.content:
DPRK shooter wins gold medal 
    Pusan, October 7 (KCNA correspondent) -- DPRK shooter Kim Jong Su won a gold medal with 587 points in men's individual 25m centre fire pistol event of the 14th Asian Games on Monday.
 He bagged a silver medal in men's individual 10 m air pistol event on Oct. 3.
